Class NormalLevel

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.worlds.GameWorld
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.worlds.NormalLevel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class NormalLevel extends GameWorld
NormalLevel inherit from GameWorld. NormalLevel is level only contain a Hero and Enemy.
Author:
YuyanZhou
